Just a suggestion but I think if we we're able to convert our rune pages and/or our runes into IP **AS AN OPTION** people could use the IP to buy champions and whatever else. The people who already have tons of IP and have all the champions **DO NOT HAVE TO** convert their runes and rune pages into more useless IP. Just as a choice. I know this won't solve the problem for the majority of the players but I think it would help

Dear Rito

I just did some math, and I have 208 marks/glyphs/seals and 38 quints (all tier 3). I have 11 additional rune pages (13 total), all purchased with IP.
That comes to around 200000-250000 IP.

I own 96/137 champions, all purchased with IP, and the total IP cost of the champions I don't own is under 200000.

I have purchased RP (I'm not just f2p), but spent it all on skins (have around 50).

Under the new system, I see 4-6 rune pages being plenty.

Sure I have had use out of those runes (and pages), but if I had unlocked every champion, I would continue to get use out of them post rune changes.

I'm not going to make any demands on compensation, but how this is handled will determine whether I ever purchase RP again in the future.

Not saying what is happening is right, but from the point of view of Riot, people saying they purchased runes and pages for no reason, that's not necessarily true. Chances are if you bought them, you have used them to improve the quality of your game play. If you pay for something and use it for years which then gets given out for nothing, is it fair to demand a refund?
Yes but the runes aren't a luxury; they are required to play the game competently. It isn't just a minor improvement to quality of game play.
